title: 如何平价过去7天纽约枪击暴增358%？
contents:
https://www.nbcnewyork.com/news/local/weekly-nyc-shootings-soar-358-over-last-year-data-shows/2478075/?_osource=SocialFlowTwt_NYBrand


New York City shootings over the last seven days skyrocketed by more than 358 percent compared with the same time period in 2019,
